message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Bullish tilt with PSUs, power and select financials closing near highs on strong absolute volumes (NHPC, GAIL, NBCC, ABCAPITAL, LTF). Hospitals diverged (FORTIS/NH strong; MAXHEALTH/APOLLOHOSP softer). Defense shipyards saw profit-taking (GRSE, BEML, MAZDOCK), IT/ER&D largely range-bound. Our holdings both green; no trades today.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "FORTIS", "signal": "Breakout watch > 975", "reason": "Closed near day high with strong momentum; potential follow-through above recent high", "price": 970.75},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Momentum long on dips/BO", "reason": "Wide bullish candle from 235 to 245 with strong close; watch dips to 240–242 or BO > 247.5", "price": 244.84},
    {"symbol": "NHPC", "signal": "Continuation buy on strength", "reason": "PSU power bid; close near high; watch push through 86.5–87", "price": 85.87},
    {"symbol": "GAIL", "signal": "Breakout watch near 177", "reason": "Trend up and close near high; monitor a clean move/close above 177–178", "price": 176.49},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Breakout watch > 291", "reason": "Strong close at resistance zone with healthy volume", "price": 289.85},
    {"symbol": "VOLTAS", "signal": "Reversal strength", "reason": "Bounce and close near high; watch 1385–1390 for fresh momentum", "price": 1374.50},
    {"symbol": "LICI", "signal": "Round-number breakout watch", "reason": "Approaching ₹900; sustained close above could unlock momentum", "price": 895.05},
    {"symbol": "WOCKPHARMA", "signal": "Momentum—buy only on controlled pullbacks", "reason": "Wide-range breakout day; elevated risk after sharp run", "price": 1564.40},
    {"symbol": "GODFRYPHLP", "signal": "Breakout follow-through", "reason": "Strong breakout candle; monitor sustenance above 3540", "price": 3512.00},
    {"symbol": "FSL", "signal": "Avoid/Wait for reclaim", "reason": "Bearish breakdown; demand only if price reclaims 335–340", "price": 326.35},
    {"symbol": "GRSE", "signal": "Caution—distribution risk", "reason": "Heavy selloff from highs; wait for stabilization back above 2520–2550", "price": 2493.60},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Breakout watch > 108.5", "reason": "PSU EPC momentum intact; closing strength near resistance", "price": 107.33}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 4140.00,
    "total_value": 25290.50,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 units @ 142.00, LTP 142.42",
      "HINDCOPPER: 35 units @ 312.00, LTP 319.46"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Holdings: ASHOKLEY consolidating 141–144; add only on close > 144.2 with volume. HINDCOPPER strong; watch 326 breakout or add on pullback to 312–314 with tight risk.",
    "PSU/power bid continued: NHPC, GAIL, SJVN (mild), NBCC, HUDCO showed strength. Favor continuation setups over fresh laggards.",
    "Defense shipyards weak: GRSE, BEML, MAZDOCK saw profit-taking; HAL comparatively resilient. Prefer relative strength if re-entering the theme.",
    "Hospitals diverged: FORTIS/NH showed strength; MAXHEALTH/APOLLOHOSP softer. If adding healthcare, favor names closing near highs (FORTIS, NH).",
    "Financials: ABCAPITAL, LTF, CHOLAHLDNG, POONAWALLA showed momentum; PSBs (UCOBANK, IOB, IDBI) steady—consider only on breakouts to avoid chop.",
    "Consumer/Discretionary: VOLTAS posted strong reversal; VBL steady; JUBLFOOD soft—focus on leaders showing closes near highs.",
    "IT/ER&D mixed: COFORGE flat-to-firm; KPITTECH, PERSISTENT, TATAELXSI mostly range-bound; avoid aggressive entries until breakouts.",
    "Metals/chemicals mixed: HINDCOPPER firm; SAIL flat; TATACHEM and DEEPAKNTR soft; SHYAMMETL mild weakness—be selective and trade near key levels.",
    "Renewables: WAAREEENER strong; INOXWIND and KPIGREEN softer—prefer leaders on strength over laggard bounces.",
    "Logistics/midcap industrials: AEGISLOG faded from highs—wait for basing; IRB/IRCON muted.",
    "Real estate: PRESTIGE, OBEROIRLTY had constructive closes; trend bias remains up; wait for tight-range setups.",
    "High-volume movers to watch: IDEA (very high turnover), MAXHEALTH, INDUSINDBK, WOCKPHARMA—use levels to avoid noise.",
    "Risk plan for Monday: Focus on breakout-or-dip-to-support entries in FORTIS, LTF, NHPC, GAIL, ABCAPITAL, VOLTAS; avoid chasing extended candles (e.g., WOCKPHARMA) and names showing distribution (GRSE, AEGISLOG).",
    "Position sizing: Given small portfolio, limit any new single-position risk to 2–3% of portfolio with clear stop levels; prefer 1–2 additions max.",
    "Set weekend alerts: FORTIS 975, LTF 247.5/242, NHPC 86.5, GAIL 177.5, ABCAPITAL 291, VOLTAS 1385, LICI 900, NBCC 108.5."
  ]
}
